casebody.data:
DIAMOND 67, LLC
v.
Derek V. OATIS et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 11, 2016

Reed A. Slatas, in support of the petition.

Richard P. Weinstein, in opposition.

The defendant Ann Letendre's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn.App. 659, 144 A.3d 1055 (2016), is denied.
